definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights about anti bot related logs.

## Widgets
1. Total Events
2. Events Over Time
3. Events by Severity
4. Events by Action
5. Top Events by File Name
6. Top Events by File Type
7. Events by Protection Type
8. OS Distribution
9. Source Details
10. Malware Action Distribution
11. Top Clients
12. Top Destinations
13. Log Details
